New Records: Shaheen Afridi was awarded the @Aramco POTM for his all-round brilliance
Mohammad Amir and Haris Rauf both went on a hat-trick against India
Key Match Events: Pakistan clinch a three-wicket win over Ireland in their final game of the tournament
Pakistan find themselves at 57/5 with the Irish bowlers showcasing a spirited fightback
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam should not be made a scapegoat to hide the system's and team's faults
I honestly can't remember seeing a Pakistani batting line up this brittle...it's sad really
Miscellaneous Highlights: T20 World Cup में टीम इंडिया रचेगी इतिहास! इस वर्ल्ड रिकॉर्ड को तोड़ने से सिर्फ 2 कदम दूर भारत
Pakistan hold their nerve in Florida
